title: Baby Blessed
description: A cherished wife, a husband deeply loved. And a baby who made Molly Larabee's golden circle complete. Until the tiniest link gave way...crushing her marriage beneath an avalanche of grief.Then suddenly, unexpectedly, Jordan claimed one last night of her passion. Shadowed by memories, they created hope for tomorrow. But would this new life bring only new sadness...or prove a baby blessed?
author: Debbie Macomber
